amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund to protect women's access to health care, including primary and preventive care, in a manner consistent with protecting rights of conscience.

vote.text: Amendment SA 630 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 44 - 55. Record Vote Number: 55.
